participant_1.background:
I'm a single scientist who uses makeup to feel confident and powerful.
i sell clothing on facebook.
i like cosplay.
I would love to learn how to play the guitar like the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
i love children.

participant_2.background:
My worst fear is that I will lose my sense of humor.
I remember the hours I spent practicing my flute in the attic, lost in the music and my own thoughts.
my dog s name is wonwon.
I took up brewing my own beer and became a regular at local car shows with my Ford F-150.
I have a laptop that I use to do my schoolwork and write my stories.

content.text: Hello there! How are you today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cosplay, sell clothes on Facebook, and play music!
Oh wow, that sounds really fun! I've never tried cosplaying before, but it looks like it would be a lot of fun. Do you have any favorite cosplays that you've done?
Yes, I love cosplaying as Harley Quinn! I think she's such a fun character to play.
That's awesome! I've always been a fan of Harley Quinn myself. She's so badass!
Thank you! I love her too.
What do you like to play music on?
I play guitar and ukulele. I've been playing for a few years now and I'm still learning, but I'm really enjoying it.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar, but I've never had the time to take lessons.
It's never too late to start! I taught myself how to play guitar and I'm not very good, but it's still a lot of fun.
I might have to give it a try!
You should! It's a lot of fun to learn and you'll be surprised at how quickly you pick it up.
Thank you for the encouragement! I might just do that
